nodes.text: A Mother's Memoirs, Concluded is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 14, 2005 and took the form of a final memoir recorded by the Tarasin Mother Dariana. It related the death of her mother and the final words she passed on. It was accompanied by role-playing statistics for Dariana.
